Classes in com.utilis.game.obj used by com.utilis.game.gui
Entity
          Class representing an object that is not locked to a grid and can collide with other Colliders
HUDElement
          A class representing any kind of custom GUI element

Classes in com.utilis.game.obj used by com.utilis.game.obj
Collider
          An abstract class for all classes which can be used in collision detection.
Collider.CollisionBoxSizeException
          exeception to be thrown if ColisionBox size does not match current CollisionBox size when setting CollisonBox
CollisionBox
          A class for storing the actual solid points that collide with another Collider.
CollisionGroup.Collision
          A class which stores the values of a collision - the Colliders which collided, and whether or not a collision actually occurred.
Tile
          A class representing an object that is locked to a grid and cannot move.
